kekkei_genkai.name: Gale Style
kekkei_genkai.description: A rare wind-based Kekkei Genkai that allows the user to manipulate high-speed wind currents and create devastating gale-force attacks.

jutsus.name: Gale Burst
jutsus.description: Creates a sudden burst of wind that knocks back enemies and deals moderate damage.

jutsus.name: Tornado Drill
jutsus.description: Creates a spinning tornado that moves forward, dealing continuous damage to enemies in its path.

jutsus.name: Gale Barrier
jutsus.description: Creates a protective wind barrier that deflects projectiles and reduces incoming damage.

jutsus.name: Hurricane Devastation
jutsus.description: Summons a massive hurricane that devastates a large area, dealing heavy damage and creating chaos.

jutsus.name: Wind Walk
jutsus.description: Allows the user to move at incredible speed by riding wind currents.

jutsus.name: Gale Blade Technique
jutsus.description: Creates multiple wind blades that slice through enemies with extreme precision and speed.

passive_abilities.name: Wind Affinity
passive_abilities.description: All wind-based jutsus cost 20% less chakra and deal 15% more damage.

passive_abilities.name: Gale Sense
passive_abilities.description: Can detect enemies within a 20-block radius through air currents.

passive_abilities.name: Wind Resistance
passive_abilities.description: Takes 50% less damage from wind-based attacks and is immune to knockback.

awakening_form.name: Tempest Lord
awakening_form.description: The ultimate form of Gale Style, transforming the user into a master of all winds.
